title: Submissive After Dark: Explicit Sex Stories Bundle
description: This erotic story bundle from author Cara Cane includes four kinky stories with a related theme: submitting to your desires. Stories range from a light introduction to submission and spanking to an explicit hardcore story of domination. All of the stories are designed to arouse and allow the reader to explore sexuality through the written word. This bundle includes two short stories, a short novelette, and the bestselling three-part novelette, Lolly Learns a Lesson. Story list: Melanie's First Menage: MFM Midnight Gang Bang: FMMMMM Video Booth Venture: MF/FMF Lolly Learns a Lesson: MF/MFM Content warning: This story bundle is all sex and no nonsense. It contains explicit language and material from start to finish. Themes explored in this novelette: BDSM, (spanking, submission, domination), polyamory, casual encounters, and more.
author: Cara Cane
